item.title: Call for CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams on 11 and 12 march 2026
item.description: The call is open to register for the CELI 1 A2, CELI 2 B1 and CELI 3 B2 exams scheduled on 11 and 12 march 2026.%0AN.B: seats for the CELI 2 B1 exam are sold out.%0A%0AðŸ“„ Bando CELI in inglese_11-12 marzo 2026_signed.pdf
